attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a DJ and artist, Hanal has entertained the world for many years. He is a cultural ambassador for the United Kingdom, having made an indelible impact on global popular culture, often collaborating with other artists from various nations.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
